bodyV2.markdown:
To claim on your ticket protection, you must either visit www.ticketplangroup.com/refund-application-form and complete an online refund application form, or write to them at:

 

TicketPlan Ltd

Evolution House

New Garrison Road

Shoeburyness

Essex

SS3 9BF

 

For more information regarding the Terms and Conditions of this ticket protection, please visit: https://www.lovetheatre.com/information/ticket-insurance

content.name: How do I claim my TicketPlan protection?
